languages.text: "Первое место из загадок находится недалеко отсюда — это мост, который должен был проходить через центр этого района, а затем устремляться через Бездну к соседнему астероиду. Была построена всего пара пролетов, да и от тех остались только руины... Тем не менее, если тайник уцелел за эти годы, он где-то там".

"The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."
languages.original_text: "Первое место из загадок находится недалеко отсюда — это мост, который должен был проходить через центр этого района, а затем устремляться через Бездну к соседнему астероиду. Была построена всего пара пролетов, да и от тех остались только руины... Тем не менее, если тайник уцелел за эти годы, он где-то там".

traits.locale_text: "The first spot from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

"The first spot from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

"The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

"The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

"The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

languages.text: 「なぞなぞが示す最初の場所はここからさほど遠くありません――この区画の中心から隣接する小惑星の方まで続く、ヴォイドにかかる橋です。2、3柱程度しか建設されず、それさえも廃墟と化しています…しかし、長い年月を経ても宝が残っているのであれば、まだどこかにあるはずです」
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: 「なぞなぞが示す最初の場所はここからさほど遠くありません――この区画の中心から隣接する小惑星の方まで続く、ヴォイドにかかる橋です。2、3柱程度しか建設されず、それさえも廃墟と化しています…しかし、長い年月を経ても宝が残っているのであれば、まだどこかにあるはずです」

languages.text: “谜语里的第一个地点离这里不远。那是一座桥，它本该横跨这个地区中心，延伸到虚空之中，成为与邻近小行星之间的桥梁。这座桥只建好了几座桥台，而如今，就连那些桥台也都化作了废墟……尽管如此，如果那个藏匿处依然能幸存下来的话，那它应该就在那里的某个地方。”
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: “谜语里的第一个地点离这里不远。那是一座桥，它本该横跨这个地区中心，延伸到虚空之中，成为与邻近小行星之间的桥梁。这座桥只建好了几座桥台，而如今，就连那些桥台也都化作了废墟……尽管如此，如果那个藏匿处依然能幸存下来的话，那它应该就在那里的某个地方。”

languages.text: «La primera ubicación de los acertijos no está lejos de aquí. Es un puente que supuestamente iba a atravesar el centro de este distrito y adentrarse en el vacío hacia el asteroide de al lado. Solo se construyeron un par de vanos que ahora se encuentran en ruinas... Aun así, si el escondrijo ha sobrevivido tantos años, debería de estar allí».
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: «La primera ubicación de los acertijos no está lejos de aquí. Es un puente que supuestamente iba a atravesar el centro de este distrito y adentrarse en el vacío hacia el asteroide de al lado. Solo se construyeron un par de vanos que ahora se encuentran en ruinas... Aun así, si el escondrijo ha sobrevivido tantos años, debería de estar allí».

languages.text: « Le premier n'est pas loin d'ici, c'est un pont qui était censé traverser le centre de ce quartier pour le relier à l'astéroïde voisin. Seuls quelques-uns de ses piliers ont été construits et ils sont aujourd'hui en ruine... Cela étant, si la cachette existe encore, elle doit se trouver quelque part par là. »
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: « Le premier n'est pas loin d'ici, c'est un pont qui était censé traverser le centre de ce quartier pour le relier à l'astéroïde voisin. Seuls quelques-uns de ses piliers ont été construits et ils sont aujourd'hui en ruine... Cela étant, si la cachette existe encore, elle doit se trouver quelque part par là. »

languages.text: "Der erste Ort aus den Rätseln ist gar nicht weit von hier – eine Brücke, die durch das Zentrum dieses Viertels und in die Leere zum benachbarten Asteroiden führen sollte. Nur wenige ihrer Stützen wurden gebaut, und selbst die liegen in Ruinen ... Aber wenn es das Lager nach all den Jahren noch gibt, müsste es irgendwo dort sein."
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Der erste Ort aus den Rätseln ist gar nicht weit von hier – eine Brücke, die durch das Zentrum dieses Viertels und in die Leere zum benachbarten Asteroiden führen sollte. Nur wenige ihrer Stützen wurden gebaut, und selbst die liegen in Ruinen ... Aber wenn es das Lager nach all den Jahren noch gibt, müsste es irgendwo dort sein."

languages.text: "Bilmecelerdeki ilk yer, buradan çok uzak sayılmaz: Bu semtin merkezinden çıkıp uçsuzda komşu bir asteroide doğru uzanması tasarlanan bir köprü olacaktı. Köprünün kirişlerinden sadece birkaçı inşa edilmişti ki onlar bile harap hâlde... Olsun, o zula bunca yıl sağlam kalmışsa orada bir yerdedir."
languages.original_text: "The first location from the riddles isn't far from here — it's a bridge that was supposed to go through the centre of this district and into the void toward the neighbouring asteroid. Only a couple of its spans were built, and even those lie in ruins... Still, if the cache survived after all those years, it is there somewhere."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmecelerdeki ilk yer, buradan çok uzak sayılmaz: Bu semtin merkezinden çıkıp, uçsuzda komşu bir gök taşına doğru uzanması tasarlanan bir köprü olacaktı. Köprünün kirişlerinden sadece birkaçı inşa edilmişti ve onlar bile harap hâlde... Olsun, o zula bunca yıl sağlam kalmışsa, oralarda bir yerdedir."
